text: Carnegie Hall is an Art Deco theatre located in Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland. It was named after the industrialist and philanthropist Andrew Carnegie, who was born in Dunfermline. It officially opened in 1937 and was designated a Category B listed building in 1993. ==References== ==External links== * Carnegie Hall official website Category:Dunfermline Category:Category B listed buildings in Fife Category:Theatres in Scotland Category:Reportedly haunted locations in Scotland Category:Andrew Carnegie
title: Carnegie Hall, Dunfermline
